Articles.Content:
Been a while since I posted about music here. So with a significant shortfall of ado, here are the latest few things I've released:

Muy rÃƒÂ¡pido drum & bass smoothness:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AXarE9csPvI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Bandcamp: [https://silisko.bandcamp.com/track/annesburg-city-limits](https://silisko.bandcamp.com/track/annesburg-city-limits)

Soundcloud: [https://soundcloud.com/silisko/annesburg-city-limits-released](https://soundcloud.com/silisko/annesburg-city-limits-released)

Chill swishy weirdness:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/3_FCs7Fgktg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Bandcamp: [https://silisko.bandcamp.com/track/cloudless-everyday](https://silisko.bandcamp.com/track/cloudless-everyday)

Soundcloud: [https://soundcloud.com/silisko/cloudless-everyday](https://soundcloud.com/silisko/cloudless-everyday)

And a heavy sampling/remixed thing:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gxQI69zQlyc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Bandcamp: [https://silisko.bandcamp.com/track/i-wanna-be-all-right](https://silisko.bandcamp.com/track/i-wanna-be-all-right)

Soundcloud: [https://soundcloud.com/silisko/i-wanna-be-all-right](https://soundcloud.com/silisko/i-wanna-be-all-right)

They're all name your price to download, with a minimum of exactly free. Though, any scraps at all are appreciated and will make me love you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I hope this doesn't break the advertising rule. Also, we need a [music] prefix.

Cloudless Everyday is your best one yet. I can't really say why though. I recently remembered that you make music and after looking up your soundcloud profile i just listened to it the whole day while building a station around the Mun.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-08T19:06:11Z" title="06/08/2015 07:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 8, 2015</time> by Canopus**
